pages.text: $(warning) This spell will only function when modifiers targeting specific block types are enabled.$(br2)These nearby plants and natural objects are slowly broken as the spell is channeled.$(br2)Modifiers allow you to select which plants are broken, including grasses, mushrooms, leaves, and more.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:natures_scythe/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Radius:$() Blocks within a radius of $(spell:natures_scythe/radius) horizontally and $(spell:natures_scythe/radius_y).$(br2)$(bold)Affected Blocks:$() Up to $(spell:natures_scythe/max_affected) blocks are broken every $(spell:natures_scythe/SECONDS/interval) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Leaves:$() With the $(modifier:leaf_harvester)$() modifier enabled, blocks matching the entry $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/tree_dictionary)$() are broken.

$(bold)Webs:$() With the $(modifier:dewebbing)$() modifier enabled, blocks that match the ore dictionary entry $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/web_dictionary)$() are broken.$(br2)$(bold)Grass:$() With the $(modifier:grass_harvester)$() modifier enabled, blocks that match the ore dictionary entry $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/grass_dictionary)$() and $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/vine_dictionary)$() are broken.$(br2)$(bold)Mushrooms:$() With the $(modifier:mushroom_harvester)$() modifier enabled, blocks that match the ore dictionary entry $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/mushroom_dictionary)$() are broken.

$(bold)Flowers:$() With the modifier $(modifier:flower_harvester)$() modifier enabled, blocks that match the ore dictionary entry $(bold)$(spell:natures_scythe/flower_dictionary)$() are broken.$(br2)$(bold)Voiding:$() With the $(modifier:voiding_scythe)$() upgrade, blocks are completely destroyed instead of broken.$(br2)$(bold)Silk Touch:$() With the $(modifier:silk_scythe)$() modifier enabled, blocks are broken as with shears or silk touch.$(br2)$(bold)Fortune:$() With the $(modifier:fortunate_scythe)$() modifier enabled, blocks are

broken as though with Fortune II.$(br2)$(bold)Speed:$() With the $(modifier:blazing_speed)$() modifier enabled, the number of affected blocks broken every $(spell:natures_scythe/SECONDS/interval) is doubled.
